paragraphs.name: b2a8
paragraphs.text: In every organization, there are a select few employees who would be difficult to replace. For the most part, most people are like the older son in the story. Most people could be easily replaced. Most people are passive and reactive. They require specific instructions. They need to be governed and managed in all things.
Conversely, doing only what you’re told entails no risk and carries no responsibility. It’s playing safe.
paragraphs.name: ac79

paragraphs.text: Being successful requires being proactive and not waiting for life to come to you. It means you’re on offense, not defense. You’re active, not passive.
paragraphs.name: b3a8
b3a8
paragraphs.text: Being successful requires being proactive and not waiting for life to come to you. It means you’re on offense, not defense. You’re active, not passive.

paragraphs.name: 4b7d
paragraphs.text: Most people only do what they are asked, doing only the minimum requirement. They need specific instructions on most things they do.

paragraphs.name: b3a8
paragraphs.text: Being successful requires being proactive and not waiting for life to come to you. It means you’re on offense, not defense. You’re active, not passive.

paragraphs.name: 35da
paragraphs.text: Dear Benjamin,

paragraphs.name: ba01
paragraphs.text: THank you for this parable. I had heard it already a few times. And this tim it came in a good moment because I was worrying not to do the right thing. I always was like the younger son. But sometimes I am afraid to be too active. Thanks for the lesson in the right moment.

virtuals.subtitle: If you like what you are doing and are really interested in it, I believe it is but natural to be proactive and be an initiator.

content.subtitle: If you like what you are doing and are really interested in it, I believe it is but natural to be proactive and be an initiator.

paragraphs.text: This is perfect. I found putting this behavior into action very difficult at first. And then I noticed one factor why I couldn’t apply it that easily. It was because I didn’t like what I was doing.

paragraphs.name: 7ec8
paragraphs.text: If you like what you are doing and are really interested in it, I believe it is but natural to be proactive and be an initiator.

paragraphs.name: b8f3
paragraphs.text: Again, thanks for the great read. ☺

f9aac236b614.title: Love this, and preach this same message.

paragraphs.name: 7baa
paragraphs.text: Love this, and preach this same message. I sometimes refer to this as “own your work”. I would always share this with my students and tell them, “don’t just bring me a problem, bring me a solution with it”. You might not be officially responsible for a project all the way through, but you should care and act as if you are, without stepping on toes…

virtuals.subtitle: Thank you. I have not heard this parable and it really shines a light on my own behavior. I do believe I needed that.

paragraphs.text: Most often, work is just that, work. It’s not some opportunity to proactively change or expand or optimize the company. It’s just a job you have to do to get by. Jobs, by the way, that are fast disappearing.
